title: Random events
creator_credit: Educational Services, Physical Sciences Study Committee, Kevin Smith and John Friedman
brief_description: Patterson Hume and Donald Ivey demonstrate how the overall effect of a large number of random events can be predicted statistically, and apply the results to the predicability of radioactive decay.
